Commands.Astral Fire: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Astral Fire stance for 3 turns and removes Umbral Ice.  Astral Fire raises Max BRV and Attack.
Commands.Umbral Ice: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Umbral Ice stance for 3 turns and removes Astral Fire.  Umbral Ice raises Initial BRV and grants BRV Regen.
Commands.Umbral Ice+: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Umbral Ice stance for 3 turns and Small Magical Attack Up for 8 turns.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ (Ice) and HP Attack to HP Attack+ (Ice).

Passives.Astral Fire Charge: Increases the max uses of Astral Fire by 1.
Passives.Astral Fire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Astral Fire.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Umbral Ice Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Umbral Ice.
Passives.Umbral Ice Charge: Increases the max uses of Umbral Ice by 1.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Buff Base&Speed Up: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Astral Fire Extend: Increases Astral Fire's max uses by 1.Increases the number of hits to 2.Tremendously raises its total potency.Slightly raises the effects of Astral Fire.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ (Fire) and HP Attack to HP Attack+ (Fire) while Astral Fire is active.BRV Attack+ (Fire) is a 1-HIT stronger Fire-elemental BRV attack.HP Attack+ (Fire) is a 1-HIT Fire-elemental BRV+HP attack.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Greatly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Attack while buffed.
Passives.Umbral Ice Extend: Increases the number of hits to 2.Tremendously raises its total potency.Moderately raises the effects of Umbral Ice.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ (Ice) and HP Attack to HP Attack+ (Ice) while Umbral ice is active.BRV Attack+ (Ice) is a 1-HIT Ice-elemental BRV attack with low Action Delay.HP Attack+ (Ice) raises BRV based on Attack before inflicting an HP attack.Turns to Umbral Ice+ while Astral Fire is up.Umbral Ice+ grants Small Magical Attack Up for 8 turns in addition to Umbral Ice.

Weapons.Stardust Rod CP: 35: Increases Umbral Ice's potency and extends its duration.
Weapons.Anathema CP: 15: Increases Astral Fire's potency and extends its duration.
